verbs.description: slovakia coach quits after 2 defeats in nations league jan kozak [V: has] quit as slovakia coach after the team second straight loss in the uefa nations league the slovak football association says it terminated the contract with kozak at his request describing it as an unexpected decision nations league slovak football association uefa nations league jan kozak slovakia
